titleStmt.title: The demonstration of Antichrist. By Edmund Gurnay, Bach. Theol. p. of Harpley Norfolke
titleStmt.author: Gurnay, Edmund, d. 1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] B[eale] for Iames Boler, and are to be sold at the signe of the Marigold in Pauls Churchyard,
